column2: steve1234, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I've had back pain(L2,L4 L5/S1 for years now. Sometimes the pain is tolerable and other times the pain has been severe. I have noticed and learned over the years to take this med RIGHT when I START felling the pain that is 8 or over on a scale from 1 to 10. And this med works great. However, If I wait to take this med until the pain is severe, the med is not as effective, and I'll will have to take another one in 30 min. to a hr. just to get the pain under control again. Also, this med does sometimes cause constipation. I use and recommend vegetable laxative from walmart. It works great and it's natural. Also, I take some extra virgin olive oil and dip it in whole wheat bread, and that works great also. I hopes this helps.

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years
25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
ampm3, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have sever back pain---two back surgeries and cannot have any more.I have several congenitive, progressive back diseases. For 21/2 years I have been on Oxycontin which,for me, works better. However, it is difficult because you must get a new prescription every month, it cannot be called in or faxed in to the pharmacy and my doctor has to get insurance authorization because of the dosage I take--40mg 9 pills per day) So on several occasions, I have subsituted this drug (Lorcet 10650)when I cannot get Oxycontin on a timely basis. It relieves my back pain but I have to take Ibruprophen 800mg with it. I had to take this with the Oxycontin as well. This drug has three side effects which make me not use it all the time. First, I do have trouble sleeping, although I take another drug for insomnia which has always worked effectively. Secondly, this medication gives me intense hot sweats--I feel like I am burning up. This will last for about 20 minutes. But then the sweats will return periodically all day and all night long. This intense heat is usually more prevalent at night. I also lose weight very quickly--about 8 lbs. in four days. Therefore, it makes me week.I wish I could take this instead of the oxycontin because it is much easier to get (just like a regular prescription) and it is cheaper because I am given the generic form (hydrocodone/APAP 10650 tab), however the side affects are hard for me to deal with. However, I may have to stick with this medicine because of the ease of getting it (refills, call in to pharmacy, fax in, no insurance authorization).

column9: I have had 3 back surgeries in the past year. Doctors have put me on a number of medications for back related problems over the last 3 years.
